sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Italy's most wanted mafia boss Matteo Messina Denaro is arrested in Sicily after being on the run for 30 years. The German police have cleared the last of the climate activists from the village of Luzerat which is scheduled to be demolished as part of a planned expansion of a controversial brown coal mine. Italy's most wanted mafia boss Sicilian Matteo Messina Denaro, has been arrested in Palermo in Sicily.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The six-year-old had been on the run for 30 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The arrest was made in a private clinic where Denaro had undergone treatment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He was escorted and taken to a secret location by police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He was a young man when he went into hiding and the only known photo of him was this one, which dates back to the early 1990s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: On Twitter, Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni says that it's a big victory and it shows the state is not giving up in front of the mafia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He was sentenced in absentia to life imprisonment for murder and was on the Interior Ministry's list of the six most wanted criminals in Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: For many years hundreds of police officers and Carabinieri have been involved in the hunt for Italy's most notorious fugitive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The city's mayor has warned there may be no more survivors among the 44 people reported missing. Exactly one day has passed and my mother has not been found yet, explained this man. Five floors collapsed from above. It's very sad.

sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy reported that at least 73 people were wounded and 39 people had been rescued as of Sunday afternoon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In his nightly address, he condemned the complicity of Russian citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Your cowardly silence, your attempt to wait out what's happening will only end with the fact that one day these same terrorists will come for you, he said.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Evil is very sensitive to cowardice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Evil will always remember those who fear it or try to bargain with it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And when it comes for you, there will be no one to protect you." Kyiv, Kharkiv and Odessa were also hit on Saturday in attacks which Moscow said were targeted at Ukraine's military and energy infrastructure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The director general of the International Atomic Energy Agency, Rafael Grossi, is expected to travel to Ukraine this week to establish a continuous presence of safety experts at all the country's nuclear power facilities in a bid to protect a nuclear accident in a war that shows no sign of easing up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: German Defence Minister Christine Lambrecht has submitted her resignation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Long viewed as one of the weakest links in Chancellor Olaf Scholz's government, critics say the 57-year-old was out of her depth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But the Social Democratic Party politician says there was a, quote, months-long media focus on her person and says this interfered with objective reporting and the discussion of German armed forces issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: She maintains she decided to step down because the work of armed forces personnel had to be in the foreground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Nevertheless, Lambrecht was accused, amongst other things, of a lack of expertise, not dealing well with the mishaps of the Puma infantry and clumsy public appearances, as well as taking her son along in a government helicopter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Most recently, she was slammed for a New Year's Eve video in which she commented on the war in Ukraine in front of a fireworks display.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Qatargate corruption scandal, failed to declare a working trip he made to Qatar in 2020, his lawyer said on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Tarabella has not been charged in connection with the inquiry, but he is close to Pier Antonio Panzeri, an Italian former MEP from whose house 600,000 euros in cash were seized as part of the inquiry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: President Roberto Mazzola is due to unveil proposals to crack down on corruption within the parliament later today.

sentences.sentence: Belgian police conducted a string of raids in December on the addresses of MEPs, former MEPs and lobbyists. Four suspects were arrested, including one of the assembly's vice presidents, Greek MEP Eva Kiley. Police recovered a total of 1.5 million euros in cash.

A new report by the international NGO Oxfam calls for large food corporations to pay more in taxes as a way to narrow the widening gap between the rich and poor. Oxfam says wealthy companies are using the war as an excuse to pass on even bigger price hikes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The richest 1% grabbed two thirds of all new wealth since 2020.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: So that's double, almost double, what 99% of humanity had in terms of new wealth during that time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The study says that 95% of countries fail to increase taxation to the richest people and corporations at a time when one in ten people across the world goes hungry every day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In cities across Europe, climate activists have vandalized car industry billboards in a coordinated campaign to highlight the sector's environmental impact.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In Brussels, the action was timed to coincide with this week's international motor show. The campaigners covered manufacturers' posters with their own version.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Those large, oversized vehicles that they're promoting on Brussels billboards, they don't mention the climate impact of those billboards. So this artwork is quite simple.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It takes the car, adds the climate message, and it's the French call it a d√©tournement of the original advert.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The action was organized by Extinction Rebellion, with the groups Subvertizers International and Brandalism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: More than 400 mock billboards have appeared in London, Berlin, Frankfurt, Paris, and other cities and towns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The campaigners say they want more robust government policies to regulate the advertisement of environmentally harmful products.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In the transport sector, only very small CO2 savings have been achieved so far. The statistics speak for themselves, hence actions like this one here in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Hanging from a bridge, some in wheelchairs, waiting for the German police to remove them under the watchful eye of the press.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It happened in the early hours of Monday morning, long after the authorities had officially ended the eviction of thousands of activists protesting against the expansion of the controversial brown coal mine in the area.

sentences.sentence: And although there is no more life in Luzerat, the machines will continue to destroy it. So we want to make a mark and say that we will continue the struggle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Italian actress Gina Lollobrigida has died at the age of 95 at her home in Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: She was considered to be one of the greatest stars in the history of cinema from the golden years and was one of the highest profile European actresses of the 1950s and early 60s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Starring in European and American films, Lalo Brigida worked alongside greats such as Rock Hudson, Humphrey Bogart, Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis and Frank Sinatra to name but a few. Some of her many films were Trapeze, BAFTA-winning Bread, Love and Dreams and The Hunchback of Notre Dame. Gina had thousands of admirers and many lovers but never found Mr. Right despite marrying once.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: She also reinvented herself and became a photojournalist in the 1970s before embarking on a political career.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: She unsuccessfully ran for election for the European Parliament for the Democrats in 1999.
